::The Oblitercons/DevilDuer::

DevilDuer jumps back, the missile exploding right next to him and sending him 
flipping backwards into a tree, going unconscious.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"We're the ones who do the obliteration," Dark One's voice sounds as he flies 
in, in time to hear Astral's last comment. He flew toward the cluster of 
Lavacons, thinking just how stupid of them it was to do that as his machine 
guns fired rapidly at them.

"Now let me demonstrate," he says to Astral, then raising his voice, 
"Oblitercons, unite!"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hiss growls as a shot hits him in the side, sending him flying toward Dark 
One. At his leader's command, he transformed, flying toward Dark One to merge 
and make Oblitertron.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scavanger ducked under Recklessa's shots, jumping up as he heard Dark One's 
command, chuckling at the idea of stomping the enemies.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Breakdown shakes again as another shot hits him, the Oblitercon transforming 
into robot mode and jumping up, ready to form Oblitertron.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Pyro spins around, flames hitting his back. He yells in anger, spinning back 
around to fire his gun again at Griplash.

Hearing Dark One's orders, he also jumps up, forming the final part of 
Oblitertron.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Oblitertron laughs as he looks at the smaller bots, bending down to pick up a 
now-stasis locked DevilDuer and drop him into his chest compartment.

Firing his optic lasers and rifle at the group of Lavacons, he runs forward, 
trying to stomp them.
